Package gofootball

Class AllInformation

java.lang.Object
gofootball.AllInformation
public class AllInformation
extends java.lang.Object
This class includes the page of the playground that contain all information like user information, playground information

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AllInformation()
    Constructor that will call when make a new object of class and takes no Parameters ,it calls 3 lists (ArrayList Account), ArrayList RegisterGround, and ArrayList Account

    • searchAccount

      public Account searchAccount​(int index, java.lang.String passWord) throws java.lang.Exception
      searchAccount is a function from type Account that takes int index and String passWord as a parameters and check them
      Parameters:
      index - is a parameter that contain the user index and check if exist or not
      passWord - is a parameter that contain the user password and check if correct or not
      Returns:
      the user information if it is valid
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - that return message if any user information is not valid or not correct

      Returns:

      Throws:

      Returns:

      index - is a parameter that contain the account index and to edit on it
